1292260.name: LANDERS: Black Moon
1292260.description:
LANDERS: Black Moon is a sci-fi puzzle game. After the landing of several HEX-Rockets on the Black Moon, you need to find the correct positions for the lasers to solve each puzzle and turn on all the system. What happens afterwards will blow your mind.

  • A highly atmospheric and intriguing puzzle game;
  • 60 hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity.
  • Originally composed atmospheric music and sound effects;
  • Learn the basics of color mixing to solve the levels;
1292260.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
